page.title: 02WESTWOOD S.CLUB-WASHINGTON
page.content: The sign outside the club says CIU} Affiliated. CIU means club and institute union.Affiliated means people who join together.The CIU movement was formed in 1908.Before 1908 the westwood club was a private house it was called westwood house.Then it became a private club which was called (Westwood) LTD.From 1969 till 1985 they used oil for heating.500 gallons in 1969 cost Â£29.00 now it costs Â£464.00. In 1985 they changed to gas heating. in 1967 the rates where Â£520.00 now they are Â£6200.00. The club has 1557 members,1350 male members ,180 female, 27 senior and 10 committee and 4 officials.The name of the 1985 secretary is John Finnegan. There are quite a lot of activities in the club;leek shows,golf,keepfit classes,darts,pool,music and dances.
